title: Accept Transfers
description: Allows servers to accept incoming transfers via a transfer packet.
name: accept-transfers

title: Allow Flight
description: Allows users to use flight on the server while in Survival mode, if they have a mod that provides flight installed. With allow-flight enabled, griefers may become more common, because it makes their work easier. In Creative mode, this has no effect.
name: allow-flight

title: Allow Nether
description: Allows players to travel to the Nether.
name: allow-nether

title: Broadcast Console to Operators
description: Allows players to travel to the Nether.
name: broadcast-console-to-ops

title: Broadcast RCon Console to Operators
description: Send rcon console command outputs to all online operators.
name: broadcast-rcon-to-ops

title: Difficulty
description: Defines the difficulty (such as damage dealt by mobs and the way hunger and poison affects players) of the server.
name: difficulty
